pkgmetadata.longdescription:
PyIMG4


A Python library/CLI tool for parsing Apple's Image4 format.

## Usage```Usage: pyimg4 [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... A Python CLI tool for parsing Apple's Image4 format.Options: --version Show the version and exit. --help Show this message and exit.Commands: im4m Image4 manifest commands. im4p Image4 payload commands. im4r Image4 restore info commands. img4 Image4 commands.```## Requirements- Python 3.6 or higher (Python 3.7+ is recommended)- Python development headers (`python3-dev` on Debian-based OSes)## Installation- Install from [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/pyimg4/): - ```python3 -m pip install pyimg4```- Local installation: - `./install.sh` - Requires [Poetry](https://python-poetry.org)## TODO- Write documentation## SupportFor any questions/issues you have, [open an issue](https://github.com/m1stadev/PyIMG4/issues) or join my [Discord](https://m1sta.xyz/discord).
